about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Trix and the Horny Tower getting the easier ways, learning how to defeat all monsters/bosses, and unlocking the whole content of the game?



This DLC contains a PDF document with ALMOST 130 PAGES DETAILING THE WHOLE CONTENT of the game. Check its sections:

1) Main Character (Its skills and their upgrades);
2) Side Characters;
3) Quests (Descriptions, when it's available, rewards and tips);
4) Side Quests (Descriptions, when it's available, rewards and tips);
5) Equipment and Items (A list with more than 60 pieces of equipment and items available in the game and their status/effects. Also, crafting system detailed.);
6) Maps and Monsters:
-All maps of the game detailing when they have adult scenes, rewards positions (and their quantities), exit/transition positions.
-Maps' monsters - the game have more than 50, everyone with unique behaviors.
-Battle troops (all monsters available in the maps have different troops formats creating different combinations - some easier, some harder).
-Tips on how to defeat every monster and their troops.
7) Puzzle Solutions (Videos step-by-step guide of how to solve all puzzles presented in the Horny Tower. This is available for free in the game forum).
8) Girls and Friendship (Tips on how to get Friendship Tokens with all of Trix’s potential friends and unlock their scenes. This is available for free in the game forum).
9) H-Scenes (Tips on how to unlock all the full adult scenes in the game).
10) Bosses List (Tips on where you will find all bosses available in the game and how to defeat them).

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Trix and the Horny Tower\Walkthrough\

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong language and is about sexual themes.
